Identification.LongTitle: Entity Associated with a Foreign Bank Regulations

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to subsection 507(17)a of the Bank Actb, hereby makes the annexed Entity Associated with a Foreign Bank Regulations.

Section.Text: In these Regulations, Act means the Bank Act.

For the purpose of the application of any provision of the Act that would otherwise apply to an entity associated with a foreign bank, the following classes of entities associated with a foreign bank are exempted from the status of being associated with a foreign bank:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: entities each of which is the government of a foreign country, or of any political subdivision of a foreign country, that does not in Canada carry on a business that includes any of the activities referred to in paragraphs (a) to (g) of the definition “financial services entity” in subsection 507(1) of the Act;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: entities each of which is controlled by the government of a foreign country, or of any political subdivision of a foreign country, and that

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: is not controlled by a foreign bank,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: does not engage in Canada in any of the activities referred to in paragraphs (a) to (h) of the definition “financial services entity” in subsection 507(1) of the Act, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: has not been deemed under subsection 507(3) of the Act to be associated with a foreign bank;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: entities each of which is an entity that

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: is associated with a foreign bank only because the entity controls the foreign bank, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: is an entity described in paragraphs 468(1)(a) to (f) of the Act;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: entities each of which is an entity that is controlled by an entity exempted under paragraph (c) and that

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: is not a foreign bank described in paragraph 508(1)(a) of the Act, or

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: is not controlled by a foreign bank described in paragraph 508(1)(a) of the Act;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: entities each of which is a Canadian entity that

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: is not described in paragraph (c) or (d),

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: is an entity associated with a foreign bank only because it controls the foreign bank, except where the foreign bank is described in paragraph 508(1)(a) of the Act and either the foreign bank or an entity controlled by it

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: engages in or carries on business in Canada, otherwise than by holding, managing or otherwise dealing with real property,

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: maintains a branch in Canada, other than an office referred to in section 522 of the Act,

Clause.Label: (C)
Clause.Text: establishes, maintains or acquires for use in Canada an automated banking machine, a remote service unit or a similar automated service, or, in Canada, accepts data from such a machine, unit or service other than in circumstances described in section 511 or 512 of the Act,

Clause.Label: (D)
Clause.Text: acquires or holds control of, or a substantial investment in, a Canadian entity, or

Clause.Label: (E)
Clause.Text: acquires or holds any share or ownership interest in a Canadian entity that

Subclause.Label: (I)
Subclause.Text: an entity associated with the foreign bank holds control of, or a substantial investment in, or

Subclause.Label: (II)
Subclause.Text: the foreign bank, an entity associated with the foreign bank and one or more other entities associated with the foreign bank would, if they were one person, hold control of, or a substantial investment in, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: has not been deemed under subsection 507(3) of the Act to be associated with a foreign bank; and

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: entities each of which is an entity that is controlled by a Canadian entity exempted under paragraph (e) and

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: is not a foreign bank described in paragraph 508(1)(a) of the Act, or

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: is not controlled by a foreign bank described in paragraph 508(1)(a) of the Act.

Section.Text: The Minister may, by order, and subject to any terms and conditions that the Minister considers appropriate, deem, for the purposes of any provision of the Act, any entity not to be an entity associated with a foreign bank.

These Regulations come into force on the day on which subsection 507(17) of the Bank Act, as enacted by section 132 of the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada Act, chapter 9 of the Statutes of Canada, 2001, comes into force.

Footnote.Text: [Note: Regulations in force October 24, 2001, see SI/2001-102.]
